To them, anyone who is not a Muslim is an infidel, and they should be killed. No matter how many terrorist we kill or imprison, there are 100 more to take his place. The only way to prevent more terrorist attacks would be a complete elimination of Muslims and Islamist. Now I am not saying we should go on a massive killing spree, Im just making a point. Muslims do not just target Americans, they target all people who are not muslims, from England to Australia to America. Terrorist attacks are nothing more than deadly, violent hate crimes. Our government sends billions of our tax dollars to the middle east so the rebuilding can start, but all they are doing is rebuilding a society that still believes we are infidels and we all deserve to die.

After some consideration by myself on this thread that I posted, I discovered that I was not specific enough and that the point of my thread could be interpretted differently than I had intended, so I will try to clarify it. I simply meant that the only way prevent terroristst attacks around the world and bring peace to the middle east is to eliminate the belief system that these terrorist have, which is the belief that everyone who does not believe as they do should die, and that their beliefs are of muslim and islamic origins. I am not saying we should commit genocide, or kill everyone who believes in islam or the muslim religeon, nor am I saying that is what I want. I am only saying that to have peace in the middle east probably wont happen as long as people kill innocent people based on their religeous system. Hopefully this clarification will be understood as I mean it, and not differently again. I apoligize to all for the misunderstanding centered around my original post, I did not mean for it to be taken the way it was.
